backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing appointment booking system with staff authentication, role-based access control, user profiles, and appointment management using mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds an initial staff user 'vijaya' with password 'vijaya' to the staffUserMap during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the StaffLoginForm authentication flow with localStorage token storage via useStaffAuth hook.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the Vijaya Children's Clinic appointment booking application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including custom properties for UI components like cards, buttons, and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vijaya Children's Clinic React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, booking, staff, and admin pages, wrapped in QueryClientProvider with shared layout including header, footer, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AddStaffModal.ts: Dialog modal component for creating new staff accounts with userId, password, and optional email fields, using useCreateStaff mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDateF: Date filter component with preset buttons (Today, This Week, This Month), custom date range picker, and clear filters functionality for appointment filtering.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentSearc: Search input component with search icon and clear button for filtering appointments by patient name, child name, or phone number.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentStatu: Displays an appointment status as a colored badge with appropriate styling for pending, confirmed, completed, and cancelled states.
Provides a dropdown select component to change appointment status with options for pending, confirmed, completed, and cancelled.
frontend/src/components/ClinicDetailsSec: Renders a section displaying clinic services, contact information, timings, address, and a QR code in a two-column card layout.
frontend/src/components/EditStaffModal.t: Modal dialog for editing staff account details including password, email, and activation status with form validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts admin users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying clinic information, contact details, services, and attribution with a three-column responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation menu for Home, Book Appointment, Staff, and Admin Login routes.
frontend/src/components/StaffLoginForm.t: Staff login form with user ID and password fields, error handling, and loading states for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated states while invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for appointment management (create, list, update status) and user profile operations (get, save) with automatic cache invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffAuth.ts: Manages staff authentication flow combining Internet Identity with username/password credentials, storing auth state in localStorage with 24-hour expiration.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffManagement.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on staff users (get all, create, update, delete) with toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables for Vijaya Children's Clinic branding (cyan, green, blue) in both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that enforces admin role authorization, displays profile setup modal if needed, and provides navigation to staff management with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login page using Internet Identity for biometric authentication with automatic redirect to admin dashboard upon successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BookAppointmentPage.t: Appointment booking form with patient details, date/time selection from predefined slots (7-9 PM), form validation, and submission to backend with navigation to confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Confirmation page displayed after appointment booking with next steps information, contact details, and navigation options to home or booking another appointment.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring clinic hero section with doctor details, service offerings (newborn care, vaccination, etc.), feature highlights, and navigation to booking and staff portals.
frontend/src/pages/StaffAppointmentsPage: Staff portal for viewing and managing appointments with authentication check, date/search filtering, status updates, and appointment list display with detailed patient information.
frontend/src/pages/StaffManagementPage.t: Admin-only page for managing staff users with role-based access control, staff list display with search, add/edit/delete operations, and profile setup modal for new admins.
frontend/src/utils/dateFilters.ts: Provides date filtering utilities for appointment requests, including conversion from bigint timestamps, date range calculations (today/week/month/custom), and filtering functions to match appointments against date criteria.
frontend/src/utils/searchFilter.ts: Implements text-based search filtering for appointments by matching query strings against parent name, child name, and phone number fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including vijaya-cyan/green/blue palettes), container settings, border radius variables, and extended theme properties using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating a bug fix request for staff portal authentication where 'vijaya'/'vijaya' credentials return unauthorized error, with pending requirements to fix backend authentication and verify user storage.
